text:
Pakistan has arrested 45 Indian fishermen and seized five boats from them for allegedly violating its territorial waters off the coast of Sindh province, officials said on Wednesday.

The arrests were made on Tuesday after Pakistan Maritime Security Agency (PMSA) took action against the intruders in the southern province.

“The fishermen were arrested and handed over to the police,” an official said, adding that five boats were also confiscated. — PTI
title: Pakistan arrests 45 fishermen
